item.title: orthogonal polynomials

item.title: basis function
item.description: Concept Interpolating function f can be define as linear combination of basis functions f(t) = \sum_{j=1}^n x_j\phi_j(t) Fourier basis comprising sines and coses.

item.title: Splines
item.description: Concept Splines is a piece-wise polynomial s(x)\vert_{\Omega_j} = a_j + b_jx + c_jx^2 + d_jx^3 + \dots where \Omega_j is j-th domain, every domain has their own function.

item.title: Chebyshev Polynomials
item.description: Concept started with T_0 = 1 and T_1 = x T_{k + 1}(x) = 2xT_k(x) - T_{k - 1}(x) Weight for first-kind Chebyshev Polynomials w(t)=\sqrt{1-t^2}.

item.title: Legendre Polynomials
item.description: Concept started with P_0 = 1 and P_1 = x, P_{k + 1}(x) = \frac{2k + 1}{k + 1}tP_k(t) - \frac{k}{k + 1}P_{k - 1}(t) Weight w(x) = 1.
